apps.title: Redaktör
apps.short_description: A text editor designed for use with Termux and external keyboards
apps.full_description: A text editor designed for use with Termux and external keyboards, Redaktör uses Androids 'Storage Access Framework' which allows read/write access to files in device storage, Termux, Google Drive and other services. When using with a physical keyboard standard shortcuts are available (ctrl-o, ctrl-s, ctrl-n for open/save/new). Mardown files also include a preview screen

apps.title: Enkel Draw
apps.short_description: A simple drawing app for children
apps.full_description: A simple drawing app for children, designed so they're kept in-app with a simple ui, you can also save their creations

When using with a physical keyboard standard shortcuts are available (ctrl-o, ctrl-s, ctrl-n for open/save/new). Mardown files also include a preview screen
